content.text:
# List of presidents of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology__disambig_1

The Massachusetts Institute of Technology has had 20 presidents (18 inaugurated, 1 acting then inaugurated, 1 acting) in its 163-year history ().
The followings have served as president of MIT:
